attributes.action: Publish the true figures of the number of people signing online petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would appear that the figures shown for the number of people signing up to online petitions are not correct.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
